text: Dania Pérez Serrano (born 24 July 1973) is a track and road cyclist from Cuba. She represented her nation at the 1996 Summer Olympics on the road in the women's road race and on the track in the women's points race. At the 2000 Summer Olympics she competed in the women's road race. ==References== ==External links== * profile at sports-reference.com Category:Cuban female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Cuba Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Camagüey Category:1973 births Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Central American and Caribbean Games silver medalists for Cuba Category:Competitors at the 1998 Central American and Caribbean Games Category:Cyclists at the 1995 Pan American Games Category:Central American and Caribbean Games medalists in cycling
title: Dania Pérez
